definition[0]: an occasion when an opinion, idea etc is discussed
example[0]: an issue that wasn’t given an airing during the campaign
definition[1]: an occasion when a programme is broadcast on television or radio
definition[2]: an occasion when something is shown to people
example[2]: a car which had its first airing at the Paris Motor Show
definition[3]: an occasion when you let fresh air move around something
example[3]: Put your houseplants outside to give them an airing.
